string.value: Alas, agent, I have bad news again.
We underestimated the power of the virus and consequently underestimated doctor Pappers' newfound abilities.
He's taken out the entire police escort and escaped.
Luckily, he doesn't know that the car he fled in is being traced by a hidden tracking device.
You are currently the closest to the mad scientist. Intercept him at all costs.
We must not allow this nightmare happen again.
It's almost over. The moment the alien spaceship in orbit reaches the strike range, we'll launch the missiles and the alien threat will be dealt with for good.
Your objective is to neutralize Pappers. Be extremely careful, we know that he is in possession of several vials of neurostimulant.
The purpose and effects of this drug are unknown, but Pappers developed it along with the Z-120 virus, and he returned for it to the place where he was arrested by the military police.
We believe that this neurostimulant is extremely important to him, that's why he took such a huge risk to get it back.
Destroy Pappers as soon as possible, he's more dangerous than a tank division even without his drug, but I can't even bear to imagine what he'll turn into if he actually manages to use it.
Pappers seems to possess supernatural abilities. Be extremely careful and shoot first.
You're going after Dr. Pappers. Don't waste a second.
According to the tracking device in the car Pappers stole, he's nearby.
You must eliminate the scientist, or rather, not him, but what he has become, before he turns into something that can no longer be destroyed.
Oh, you again, agent! It looks to me that you don't get the hints at all, do you? I've already given you a number of wonderful opportunities to die a hero, yes.
But you imagine that you are allowed to stand in the way of progress that I represent, yes.
You're just a petty small-time criminal, yes. I'll have to destroy you.
You can be proud to be cleansed from the face of the Earth by Pappers the Great himself.
However, you may as well kill yourself, yeah. You've got a couple more minutes before my neurostimulant session ends.
Kill this monster while there is still time.
Congratulations, agent! Thanks to your efforts, the Earth is finally safe.
Our missiles launched five minutes ago and are currently only a few miles away from the alien mothership.
You brainless critters. Worthless subhumans! You have no idea what you're doing! It was our key to the highest state of…

Have a safe ride, hardtruckers!||@ffccccccThank you for playing HTA:apaTche!
@ffab1e1eYou CAN'T change the current reality and the territory KICK you out!| |@ffccccccYou haven't passed all the checkpoints. On this note the thread of prophecy is severed.
